name: Anti-Terraformer
description:
The year is 2051.  Welcome to Mars.  You are scientists, engineers, broke labourers- shipped out to Mars to do the Corps and the States' dirt work.

But Mars doesn't want that.  Mars wants to be free.  It wants you to be free with it.  The land does not invite life to live upon it, so humans want to do what humans do best: beat it into shape.

Do not let them.

They want to destroy all the wonders of Mars that have lived in their glory for billions of years.  It must be stopped.

Mars shall not be made into the Earth.

Mars shall stand.

A short, condensed Forged in the Dark game about fighting back against the end of the world.

Banner & background images courtesy NASA/JPL-Caltech.
